remarks: Express conjunction in terms of implication.  The forward direction, ~ annimim , is valid for all propositions, but as an equivalence, it requires a decidability condition.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 25-Apr-2018.)
statement: annimdc $p |- ( DECID ph -> ( DECID ps -> ( ( ph /\ -. ps ) <-> -. ( ph -> ps ) ) ) ) $.
